column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man driving a luxury car in a state of drunkenness hit the road divider
column4: causing the car to overturn.------The accident occurred at 12:20 am on Sunday
column7: west of Stung Meas bridge in Stoeung Mean Chey. ------According to the source
column9: a drunk man was seen driving a Lexus NXt
column13: but luckily there were no injuries.------After the incident
column14: the driver got in another car and escaped
column15: leaving the car at the scene. ------After the incident
column16: local authorities came to the location and took the car to the Traffic Police Office of Phnom Penh Capital Hall to be resolved later.------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/37843
